mapper.select: select u.username ,u.enabled ,ud.fullname ,ud.phone ,group_concat(ua.authority) as authority ,ud.createdAt from pgsds.users u left outer join pgsds.user_details ud on u.username = ud.username left outer join pgsds.authorities ua on u.username = ua.username where 1 = 1 group by u.username order by u.username
select count(0) as cnt from pgsds.users where 1 = 1 and username = #{username}
